languages.text: "Похоже, этот стих — приглашение пройти тропой кровавых следов. И я принимаю его".
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."
languages.original_text: "Похоже, этот стих — приглашение пройти тропой кровавых следов. И я принимаю его".

traits.locale_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the weavers' invitation."
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the weavers' invitation."
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."
"So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

languages.text: « On voudrait donc que je suive une piste de sang... Très bien, j'accepte l'invitation des tisseurs. »
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

traits.locale_text: « On voudrait donc que je suive une piste de sang... Très bien, j'accepte l'invitation des tisseurs. »

languages.text: «Así que me invitan a seguir un rastro de sangre. Acepto la invitación de los tejedores».
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

traits.locale_text: «Así que me invitan a seguir un rastro de sangre. Acepto la invitación de los tejedores».

languages.text: 「どうやら、血の跡を辿るように誘われているようだな。紡ぎ手の招待を受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら、血の跡を辿るように誘われているようだな。紡ぎ手の招待を受け入れよう」

languages.text: “看来那些织网者是在邀请我踏上鲜血的道路，我接受他们的邀请。”
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

traits.locale_text: “看来那些织网者是在邀请我踏上鲜血的道路，我接受他们的邀请。”

languages.text: "Ich werde also anscheinend eingeladen, einer Spur des Blutes zu folgen. Ich nehme die Einladung der Spinner an."
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde also anscheinend eingeladen, einer Spur des Blutes zu folgen. Ich nehme die Einladung der Spinner an."

languages.text: "Kan izini takip etmem isteniyor anlaşılan. Dokurların davetini kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "So I am invited to follow a trail of blood, it seems. I accept the spinners' invitation."
